ref.Programmability.Name: VCPOMProg1_23
ref.Programmability.CreateCommand:
CREATE FUNCTION [sbor].[VCPOMProg1_23] (@id int,@datestate datetime,@idVersion int,@PPO int) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Id IS NULL THEN OverMark.Id ELSE VCPOMResult.Id END AS Id--индетификатор документа ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.[Type] IS NULL THEN OverMark.[Type] ELSE VCPOMResult.[Type] END AS [Type] --Тип (ВЦП и ОМ) ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Number IS NULL THEN CAST(OverMark.Number AS int) ELSE CAST(VCPOMResult.Number AS INT) END AS Number ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Numberssp IS NULL THEN OverMark.Numberssp ELSE VCPOMResult.Numberssp END AS Numberssp--номер подпрограммы ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Numberinprog IS NULL THEN OverMark.Numberinprog ELSE VCPOMResult.Numberinprog END AS Numberinprog--номер в подпрограмме ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Numberintypessp IS NULL THEN OverMark.Numberintypessp ELSE VCPOMResult.Numberintypessp END AS Numberintypessp--номер в типе подпрограммы ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Substatep IS NULL THEN OverMark.Substatep ELSE VCPOMResult.Substatep END AS Substatep--Наименование подпрограммы ГП ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Statep IS NULL THEN OverMark.Statep ELSE VCPOMResult.Statep END AS Statep--Наименование ГП ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Captionvcpom IS NULL THEN OverMark.Captionvcpom ELSE VCPOMResult.Captionvcpom END AS Captionvcpom --Наименование ВЦП и ОМ ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Executive IS NULL THEN OverMark.Executive ELSE VCPOMResult.Executive END AS Executive --ответственный исполнитель ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Datestartsub IS NULL THEN OverMark.Datestartsub ELSE VCPOMResult.Datestartsub END AS Datestartsub --дата начала Подпрограммы ГП ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Dateendsub IS NULL THEN OverMark.Dateendsub ELSE VCPOMResult.Dateendsub END AS Dateendsub--дата окончания Подпрограммы ГП ,VCPOMResult.Goalindicator AS Goalindicator --наименование целевых показателей основной цели ,VCPOMResult.Unitd --единица измерения целевого показателя ,VCPOMResult.Value ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Datestart IS NULL THEN OverMark.Datestart ELSE VCPOMResult.Datestart END AS Datestart --дата начала ГП ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Dateend IS NULL THEN OverMark.Dateend ELSE VCPOMResult.Dateend END AS Dateend--дата окончания ГП ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Datestartvcpom IS NULL THEN OverMark.Datestartvcpom ELSE VCPOMResult.Datestartvcpom END AS Datestartvcpom--дата начала ВЦП и ОМ ,CASE WHEN VCPOMResult.Dateendvcpom IS NULL THEN OverMark.Dateendvcpom ELSE VCPOMResult.Dateendvcpom END AS Dateendvcpom ,OverMark.SuperiorGoalIndicator AS SuperiorGoalIndicator FROM (
SELECT Id AS Id--индетификатор документа ,[Type] --Тип (ВЦП и ОМ) ,Numberssp --номер подпрограммы ,Numberinprog --номер в подпрограмме ,Numberintypessp --номер в типе подпрограммы ,Substatep --Наименование подпрограммы ГП ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY VCPOMMark.id order by VCPOMMark.Goalindicator ) AS Number ,Statep --Наименование ГП ,Captionvcpom --Наименование ВЦП и ОМ ,Executive --ответственный исполнитель ,Datestartsub --дата начала Подпрограммы ГП ,Dateendsub--дата окончания Подпрограммы ГП ,Goalindicator --наименование целевых показателей основной цели ,Unitd --единица измерения целевого показателя ,CASE WHEN IndicatedCumulatively = 1 THEN ValueCumulatively WHEN (IndicatedCumulatively = 0 OR IndicatedCumulatively IS NULL) THEN Value END AS Value ,ValueCumulatively--сумма за все года ,Datestart --дата начала ГП ,Dateend--дата окончания ГП ,Datestartvcpom--дата начала ВЦП и ОМ ,Dateendvcpom--дата окончания ВЦП и ОМ
FROM (
SELECT tbl1.idvcp AS Id --индетификатор документа ,CASE WHEN tbl1.[Type] = 'Ведомственная целевая программа' THEN 'ВЦП' ELSE tbl1.[Type] --
END AS [Type] --Тип (ВЦП и ОМ) ,CAST(tbl1.Numberssp AS INT) AS Numberssp --номер подпрограммы ,CAST(tbl1.Numberinprog AS INT) AS Numberinprog --номер в подпрограмме ,CAST(tbl1.Numberintypessp AS INT) AS Numberintypessp --номер в типе подпрограммы ,tbl1.Substatep AS Substatep --Наименование подпрограммы ГП ,tbl1.Statep AS Statep --Наименование ГП ,tbl1.Captionvcpom AS Captionvcpom --Наименование ВЦП и ОМ ,org.Caption AS Executive --ответственный исполнитель ,tbl1.Datestartsub AS Datestartsub --дата начала Подпрограммы ГП ,tbl1.Dateendsub AS Dateendsub--дата окончания Подпрограммы ГП ,gi.Caption AS Goalindicator --наименование целевых показателей основной цели ,gi.IndicatedCumulatively AS IndicatedCumulatively --Флаг ,ud.Symbol AS Unitd --единица измерения целевого показателя --,vgt.Value AS Value --значение целевого показателя с самой поздней датой из всех значений с типом "План" ,Value = ( SELECT TOP 1 vgt.Value FROM [reg].ValuesGoalTarget As vgt LEFT JOIN [ref].HierarchyPeriod As hp --период(справочник) ON hp.Id = vgt.IdHierarchyPeriod --значение целевых показателей(register) AND vgt.idTerminator is null
AND vgt.idVersion = @idVersion AND vgt.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO WHERE vgt.idGoalTarget = gt.id AND hp.DateEnd = ( SELECT MAX(php.DateEnd) FROM [reg].ValuesGoalTarget As pvgt --значение целевых показателей(register) LEFT JOIN [ref].HierarchyPeriod As php --период(справочник) ON php.Id = pvgt.IdHierarchyPeriod AND pvgt.idTerminator is null AND pvgt.idVersion = @idVersion AND vgt.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO
GROUP BY idGoalTarget , idValueType HAVING idGoalTarget = gt.id AND pvgt.idValueType = 1 ) ) ,ValueCumulatively = (
SELECT SUM(vgt.Value) FROM [reg].ValuesGoalTarget As vgt WHERE vgt.idGoalTarget = gt.id AND vgt.idTerminator is null AND vgt.idVersion = @idVersion AND vgt.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO GROUP BY idGoalTarget
) --,hp.DateEnd AS Datevalue --Дата периода ,tbl1.Datestart AS Datestart --дата начала ГП
,tbl1.Dateend AS Dateend--дата окончания ГП ,tbl1.Datestartvcpom AS Datestartvcpom--дата начала ВЦП и ОМ ,tbl1.Dateendvcpom AS Dateendvcpom--дата окончания ВЦП и ОМ --,VSgi.Caption AS SuperiorGoalIndicator--Целевые показатели выше стоящей цели FROM (
SELECT tbl.Id AS Id --индетификатор документа ,tbl.Numberssp AS Numberssp --номер подпрограммы ,tbl.Statep AS Statep --Наименование ГП ,tbl.Datestart AS Datestart --дата начала ГП ,tbl.Dateend AS Dateend --дата окончания ГП ,tbl.Substatep AS Substatep --Наименование подпрограммы ГП ,tbl.Datestartsub As Datestartsub --дата начала Подпрограммы ГП ,tbl.Dateendsub AS Dateendsub --дата окончания Подпрограммы ГП ,vcpom.Caption AS Captionvcpom --Наименование ВЦП и ОМ ,vcpom.DateStart AS Datestartvcpom --дата начала ВЦП и ОМ ,vcpom.DateEnd AS Dateendvcpom--дата окончания ВЦП и ОМ ,vcpom.idProgram --id ВЦП и ОМ ,dt.Caption AS [Type] --Тип (ВЦП и ОМ) ,vcpom.idProgram AS idvcp--id ВЦП и ОМ------------------- ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY vcpom.idParent order by dt.Caption,VCPAnCode.AnalyticalCode ) AS Numberinprog --номер в подпрограмме ,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY tbl.Id,prgvcpom.idDocType order by prgvcpom.caption ) AS Numberintypessp --номер в типе подпрограммы ,vcpom.idGoalSystemElement AS idGoalSystemElement ,prgvcpom.idSBP AS idSBP FROM ((SELECT prg.Caption AS Statep ,aop.Caption AS Substatep ,aop.idProgram AS Id ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY aop.idParent order by AnCode.AnalyticalCode) AS Numberssp ,statepAtr.DateStart AS Datestart ,statepAtr.DateEnd AS Dateend ,aop.DateStart AS Datestartsub ,aop.DateEnd AS Dateendsub
FROM [reg].[Program] AS prg INNER JOIN [reg].[AttributeOfProgram] AS statepAtr -- атрибуты ГП ON statepAtr.idProgram = prg.id
AND prg.idTerminator is null AND prg.idVersion = @idVersion AND prg.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO AND statepAtr.idTerminator is null INNER JOIN [reg].[AttributeOfProgram] AS aop --атрибуты подпрограмм ON
aop.idParent = prg.id and aop.idParent = @id AND aop.idTerminator is null AND aop.idVersion = @idVersion AND aop.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO AND aop.idTerminator is null LEFT JOIN [ref].[AnalyticalCodeStateProgram] AS AnCode ON AnCode.id = aop.idAnalyticalCodeStateProgram
) AS tbl--id prog = параметр id программа LEFT JOIN [reg].[AttributeOfProgram] AS vcpom --вцп и основные мероприятия ON tbl.Id = vcpom.idParent AND vcpom.idTerminator is null AND vcpom.idVersion = @idVersion AND vcpom.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].[AnalyticalCodeStateProgram] AS VCPAnCode ON VCPAnCode.id = vcpom.idAnalyticalCodeStateProgram LEFT JOIN [reg].[Program] AS prgvcpom ON prgvcpom.id = vcpom.idProgram AND (prgvcpom.idDocType = -1543503839 OR prgvcpom.idDocType = -1543503841)--вцп и основные мероприятия AND prgvcpom.idTerminator is null AND prgvcpom.idVersion = @idVersion AND prgvcpom.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].DocType As dt ON dt.id = prgvcpom.idDocType )
) AS tbl1 LEFT JOIN [reg].SystemGoalElement As sge --регистр Элемент сц ON tbl1.idGoalSystemElement = sge.id AND sge.idTerminator is null AND sge.idVersion = @idVersion AND sge.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].SystemGoal As sg --справочник система целеполагания ON sg.id = sge.IdSystemGoal LEFT JOIN [reg].GoalTarget As gt --регистр целевые показатели ON gt.IdSystemGoalElement = sge.id AND gt.idTerminator is null AND gt.idVersion = @idVersion AND gt.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].GoalIndicator As gi --наименование показателя(справочник) ON gi.Id = gt.IdGoalIndicator LEFT JOIN [ref].SBP As sbp --наименование сбп(справочник) ON sbp.Id = tbl1.idSBP LEFT JOIN [ref].Organization As org --наименование организации(справочник) ON org.Id = sbp.idOrganization LEFT JOIN [ref].UnitDimension As ud --наименование системные измерения(справочник) ON ud.Id = gi.idUnitDimension )AS VCPOMMark ) AS VCPOMResult
FULL OUTER JOIN
( SELECT tbl1.idvcp AS Id --индетификатор документа ,CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY tbl1.idvcp order by VSgi.Caption) AS INT) AS number ,CASE WHEN tbl1.[Type] = 'Ведомственная целевая программа' THEN 'ВЦП' ELSE tbl1.[Type] --
END AS [Type] --Тип (ВЦП и ОМ) ,CAST(tbl1.Numberssp AS INT) AS Numberssp --номер подпрограммы ,CAST(tbl1.Numberinprog AS INT) AS Numberinprog --номер в подпрограмме ,CAST(tbl1.Numberintypessp AS INT) AS Numberintypessp --номер в типе подпрограммы ,tbl1.Substatep AS Substatep --Наименование подпрограммы ГП ,tbl1.Statep AS Statep --Наименование ГП ,tbl1.Captionvcpom AS Captionvcpom --Наименование ВЦП и ОМ ,org.Caption AS Executive --ответственный исполнитель ,tbl1.Datestartsub AS Datestartsub --дата начала Подпрограммы ГП ,tbl1.Dateendsub AS Dateendsub--дата окончания Подпрограммы ГП ,tbl1.Datestart AS Datestart --дата начала ГП ,tbl1.Dateend AS Dateend--дата окончания ГП ,tbl1.Datestartvcpom AS Datestartvcpom--дата начала ВЦП и ОМ ,tbl1.Dateendvcpom AS Dateendvcpom--дата окончания ВЦП и ОМ ,VSgi.Caption AS SuperiorGoalIndicator--Целевые показатели выше стоящей цели FROM ( SELECT tbl.Id AS Id --индетификатор документа ,tbl.Numberssp AS Numberssp --номер подпрограммы ,tbl.Statep AS Statep --Наименование ГП ,tbl.Datestart AS Datestart --дата начала ГП ,tbl.Dateend AS Dateend --дата окончания ГП ,tbl.Substatep AS Substatep --Наименование подпрограммы ГП ,tbl.Datestartsub As Datestartsub --дата начала Подпрограммы ГП ,tbl.Dateendsub AS Dateendsub --дата окончания Подпрограммы ГП ,vcpom.Caption AS Captionvcpom --Наименование ВЦП и ОМ ,vcpom.DateStart AS Datestartvcpom --дата начала ВЦП и ОМ ,vcpom.DateEnd AS Dateendvcpom--дата окончания ВЦП и ОМ ,vcpom.idProgram AS idvcp--id ВЦП и ОМ---------------------id ВЦП и ОМ ,dt.Caption AS [Type] --Тип (ВЦП и ОМ) ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY vcpom.idParent order by dt.Caption, VCPAnCode.AnalyticalCode ) AS Numberinprog --номер в подпрограмме ,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY tbl.Id,prgvcpom.idDocType order by prgvcpom.caption ) AS Numberintypessp --номер в типе подпрограммы ,vcpom.idGoalSystemElement AS idGoalSystemElement ,prgvcpom.idSBP AS idSBP FROM ((SELECT prg.Caption AS Statep ,aop.Caption AS Substatep ,aop.idProgram AS Id ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY aop.idParent order by AnCode.AnalyticalCode) AS Numberssp ,statepAtr.DateStart AS Datestart ,statepAtr.DateEnd AS Dateend ,aop.DateStart AS Datestartsub ,aop.DateEnd AS Dateendsub
FROM [reg].[Program] AS prg INNER JOIN [reg].[AttributeOfProgram] AS statepAtr -- атрибуты ГП ON statepAtr.idProgram = prg.id AND prg.idTerminator is null AND prg.idVersion = @idVersion AND prg.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO AND statepAtr.idTerminator is null INNER JOIN [reg].[AttributeOfProgram] AS aop --атрибуты подпрограмм ON aop.idParent = prg.id and aop.idParent = @id AND aop.idTerminator is null AND aop.idVersion = @idVersion AND aop.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].[AnalyticalCodeStateProgram] AS AnCode ON AnCode.id = aop.idAnalyticalCodeStateProgram ) AS tbl--id prog = параметр id программа LEFT JOIN [reg].[AttributeOfProgram] AS vcpom --вцп и основные мероприятия ON tbl.Id = vcpom.idParent AND vcpom.idTerminator is null AND vcpom.idVersion = @idVersion AND vcpom.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].[AnalyticalCodeStateProgram] AS VCPAnCode ON VCPAnCode.id = vcpom.idAnalyticalCodeStateProgram LEFT JOIN [reg].[Program] AS prgvcpom ON prgvcpom.id = vcpom.idProgram AND (prgvcpom.idDocType = -1543503839 OR prgvcpom.idDocType = -1543503841)--вцп и основные мероприятия AND prgvcpom.idTerminator is null AND prgvcpom.idVersion = @idVersion AND prgvcpom.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].DocType As dt ON dt.id = prgvcpom.idDocType ) ) AS tbl1 LEFT JOIN [reg].SystemGoalElement As sge --регистр Элемент сц ON tbl1.idGoalSystemElement = sge.id AND sge.idVersion = @idVersion AND sge.idPublicLegalFormation = @PPO LEFT JOIN [ref].SystemGoal As sg --справочник система целеполагания ON sg.id = sge.IdSystemGoal LEFT JOIN [ref].SBP As sbp --наименование сбп(справочник) ON sbp.Id = tbl1.idSBP LEFT JOIN [ref].Organization As org --наименование организации(справочник) ON org.Id = sbp.idOrganization INNER JOIN [tp].SystemGoal_GoalIndicatorParent AS sggip ON sggip.idOwner = sge.idSystemGoal LEFT JOIN [ref].GoalIndicator AS VSgi ON VSgi.id = sggip.idGoalIndicator ) AS OverMark
ON OverMark.Id = VCPOMResult.Id AND OverMark.number = VCPOMResult.Number )
